name: Fairness in the city - how can design help to create more equitable communities?
location: This stream will take place in (room to be confirmed)
description: It is well documented that equal societies are happier than unequal ones. Should we start by understanding people from social/anthropological perspective so that the subsequent actions in terms of urban design and planning might better contribute to a more egalitarian urban environment?

presentations.name: To be confirmed
presentations.speakers: Professor Robin Dunbar, Director, SENRG, Department of Experimental Psychology, University of Oxford

presentations.speakers: Professor Matthew Carmona, Professor of Planning & Urban Design, Bartlett School of Planning, UCL
